pages.text: Now I remember being told somewhere that geodes could only be harvested in a certain fashion.
First the large, difficult to manipulate chunks of stone need to be broken off with a pickaxe.
Next we remove the excess dirt left behind with a shovel.
Next I need to use my chisel to remove the smaller pieces of hard rock still left behind.
Lastly we brush away any remaining dust and debris with a metal brush.
